document.full_text: a blast tore through a crowded metro station in the belarus capital minsk in evening rush hour on monday, killing 11 people in what president alexander lukashenko said was an attempt to destabilize the country.
document.title: belarus metro blast kills 11, lukashenko sees plot
lines_and_colors: a blast tore through a crowded metro station in the belarus capital minsk in evening rush hour on monday, killing 11 people in what president alexander lukashenko said was an attempt to destabilize the country.
